name.description: The canonical name of the primer scheme

organism.description: The organism that this primer scheme refers to, e.g. SARS-CoV-2

developers.description: Persons or organisations responsible for developing the amplicon scheme

name.description: Descriptive name of the person or organisation

url.description: URL to identifier for person or organisation. For person, links to ORCID profiles are preferred

vendors.description: Vendors where one can purchase the primers described in the amplicon scheme or a kit containing these primers

url.description: URL to page describing primer or kit product

amplicon_size.description: The length (in base pairs) of an amplicon in the primer scheme

bed_url.description: Link to location where BED file for scheme can be downloaded

bed_checksum.description: Checksum for the primer scheme BED file, in format hash:checksum, where hash is lowercase name of hash e.g. sha256

reference_url.description: URL for reference sequence that the primer scheme refers to

reference_checksum.description: Checksum for the reference sequence, format as described for bed_checksum

citation.description: Link to publication describing the scheme (DOIs preferred when available)
